ModMetaData.name: RJW VE Highmate and Ideology patches
ModMetaData.author: igidim
ModMetaData.description:
RJW compatibility patches for Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures and Vanilla Races Expanded - Highmate.
Vanilla ideology patch replaces orgy ritual behavior with orgy behavior from c0ffee's RJW events. Requires RJW events to work, and will not apply patch if missing.
Highmate patch makes Lovin' dependency need compatible with RJW's "Lovin'".
